name: Sally McDonald
introduction: Sally McDonald is an American television soap opera director. Beside working on daytime, McDonald was also a production supervisor for game shows The $10,000 Pyramid, Card Sharks and Win, Lose or Draw.Positions held	EditThe Young and the RestlessProduction Supervisor (1990 - 1993)Associate Director (1993 – 1997)Director (1997– 2011) ( October 2012- present)Producer (2008)Supervising Producer (May 2011 - present)Awards and nominations	EditDaytime Emmy AwardNomination, 1994, 1995, 2000, 2004–2006, Directing Team, The Young and the RestlessWin, 1996–1999, 2001, 2002, Directing Team, The Young and the RestlessDirectors Guild of America AwardNomination, 2003, Directing Team, The Young and the Restless (episode #7784)Nomination, 1998, Directing Team, The Young and the Restless (episode #6437)
